comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called La Belle Epoque ca.1890 - ca.1914 incl. ArtDeco and ArtNouveau, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: multi-titled woman 29 September 1853 – 1858: Her Highness Princess Thyra of Denmark 1858 – 22 December 1878: Her Royal Highness Princess Thyra of Denmark 22 December 1878 – 28 March 1919: Her Royal Highness The Crown Princess of Hanover, Duchess of Cumberland and Teviotdale 28 March 1919 – 26 February 1933: Her Royal Highness The Crown Princess of Hanover She could have married the King of the Netherlands, instead she had a baby out of wedlock.... en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Princess_Thyra_of_Denmark
